page.title: 20EVENTS AT THE ASHWELL SHOW
page.content: Though absent this year vehicles have been a feature of the show in the past. The Vintage Car Association has its national headquarters in Ashwell. A microlight aircraft took off from the field and periodically flew overhead. The Offley and Bedford Morris Dancers entertained the crowd with a collection of Cotswold handkerchief and stick dances. Children were entertained with magic and puppet shows. There were also pony rides and a miniature railway train and a giant inflateable castle . One problem the organisers found this year was the trouble of clearing a larger than usual number of cow pats from the field. This was due to the unusually wet summer!
